text: Johannes Baptista Sumarlin (7 December 1932 â€“ 6 February 2020) was an Indonesian economist and politician. He served as Minister of Finance between 1988 and 1993. Sumarlin was born in Nglegok, Blitar, East Java. He died in Jakarta at the age of 87. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Economists Category:Indonesian politicians
